description: China on a plate! This attractive restaurant with an intriguing decor combining elegance, modern style and Asian influences serves a wide selection of Chinese specialities. Dishes include appetisers, dumplings, noodles and meat options, as well as a huge array of specialities from eight different regions, from the spicy dishes of Szechuan to the delicate flavours of Zhejiang.
